definition: to smuggle/to have an illicit affair
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: Government will take some measures to control smuggles.
sentences.chinese: 政府将会采取一些政策来控制走私。

sentences.english: Most have paid if the smuggling of cotton, but also Faqian.
sentences.chinese: 大多数都要上交，如果走私棉花，还要罚钱。

sentences.english: They trafficked in smuggled goods openly.
sentences.chinese: 他们公开地贩卖走私货。

sentences.english: A commentator in the China Daily said export curbs would encourage smuggling.
sentences.chinese: 《中国日报》评论员认为抑制出口会鼓励走私。

sentences.english: The smuggled articles must be confiscated.
sentences.chinese: 走私物品一定被没收了。

sentences.english: Smuggling is rampant so the embargo imposed by the government seems useless.
sentences.chinese: 走私很猖獗，政府的禁运令行同虚设。

sentences.english: The moonshiners had been tipped off that they were about to be raided.
sentences.chinese: 烈酒走私者得到风声说将对他们开展搜捕。

sentences.english: The government has confiscated the illegally imported goods.
sentences.chinese: 政府已扣押了那批走私货。
第八，严厉打击走私犯罪活动。

sentences.english: Responsibility for tackling smuggling will soon pass to the UK Borders Agency.
sentences.chinese: 跟踪走私的责任很快将转给英国海关机构。

sentences.english: They were spied out smuggling weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们被查出犯有走私武器罪。

sentences.english: The contraband was reported to be hidden in wooden boxes shaped like coffins.
sentences.chinese: 据报道，这些走私品被藏在形状像棺材的木箱里。

sentences.english: To go upon a smuggling expedition is an act of barratry.
sentences.chinese: 从事走私勾当是非法行为。

sentences.english: The traffickers initially smuggled the sandstone sculptures into Thailand and then brought them to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 走私贩最初将这些雕塑走私到泰国，然后转运到美国。

sentences.english: The traffickers initially smuggled the sandstone sculptures into Thailand and then brought them to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 走私贩最初将这些雕塑走私到泰国，然后转运到美国。

sentences.english: Contraband goods were found in his house.
sentences.chinese: 在他的房子里发现了走私货。

definition: to resell at a profit/to speculate
illegal immigration/to stowaway (on a ship)/to steal across the international border/to run a blockade
to suppress smugglers/to search for smuggled goods
